Articles.Content:
Hi there))

trying to make Luna-16 for KSP

some pictures of modelling progress:

![e1bc1b31a6c3.png](http://s012.radikal.ru/i320/1506/a6/e1bc1b31a6c3.png)

![e514226641c4.png](http://s017.radikal.ru/i436/1506/b8/e514226641c4.png)

need some information:

how look like real station with colors?

 i've found only one color picture:

[![87a367c732fb.png](http://s013.radikal.ru/i322/1506/f8/87a367c732fb.png)](http://www.radikal.ru)

and it has different color with other pictures of station that has mostly yellow parts

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-03T10:43:34Z" title="06/03/2015 10:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 3, 2015</time> by komatozz**

Thanks for doing this, I have wanted to do one for a long time but the ridiculous complexity of the parts has prevented that from happening. BTW there are plenty of color photos of this and duplicate soviet lunar rock probes, you just need to search a bit more. Remember there were multiple sample return missions, Luna 15,16,18,20,23 and 24. These spacecraft were more or less all identical. The yellowish one in these pictures is one of the backup spacecraft I believe. It's unlikely they were all painted identically, or painted at all, there is no way to know for sure. You can see the paint jobs are not even consistent across the museum spacecraft.

Here are some of the photos I had collected for reference when I was thinking of doing it still. If you need any help with it let me know.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0VilC/embed?background=292929&text=ffffff&link=4e76c9)
